ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Treasure changes in Frontier Mountains
ygData.msgSnippet: I bought my boots for 1k. I ve seen people asking as much as 6k. But, of all the class armors from Kunark, Singing Steel seems to be by far the most common.
ygData.messageBody:
I bought my boots for 1k.

I've seen people asking as much as 6k.

But, of all the class armors from Kunark, Singing Steel seems to be by far
the most common. (Or maybe it's that there are so few bards) I say choose
the price you want to pay and hold out for it. People on my server are
having an impossible time selling the boots. One ranger had a pair for 3
weeks and he was only asking 2k. I'm sure I could have haggled him down, but
the pair I bought fell in my lap.

As for their use...

From what I hear, you must be 45 to activate the effect. Then the process is
simple:

A) stop singing
B) right click on boots
C) resume singing

I'll confirm the level cap as soon as I turn 45.

Drae

-----Original Message-----
From: Melaniel [mailto:online.games@...]
Sent: Friday, June 09, 2000 3:36 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Treasure changes in Frontier Mountains



Just recently bought a pair of singing steel boots myself and I paid a
nice round 2k for them. I still feel it's a lot of money for a pair
of shoes, but it finally breaks up that damn blue I've been getting
bored with ;-)

My question is how do I get the things to give me some water,
right-click doesn't seem to work?? Not sure I want to drink something
that's been so close to my feet when I'm wandering through swamps, but
it's the thought that counts!

--
Melaniel, Wood Elf Bard (44)
<Ginnunga>
...bitten by the shopping bug again!

Mith Marr server

On Thu, 8 Jun 2000 18:33:39 -0500, "Bill Mann" <dabard@...>
wrote:

>One more thing: How much is Singing Steel going for on the other servers?
>Saw a level one bard mule last night auctioning SS Boots. He told me he
>can get 15k plat for them. For that much, I'ld rather just try to
organize a
>guild event in Karnor's and loot them myself :oP
>
>-=B=-
>34th
>The Rathe
